programme.desc: Euronews Witness brings world issues into focus through the experiences of people at the heart of the story. Anelise Borges goes beyond the headlines, debates and data analysis… and into people’s lives. programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom
programme.desc: Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicuna who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: Snow Day Showdown
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back!

programme.desc: Chef's friend inspires him to bring Hawai'i home by making poi and decorating the Stump-staycation style.

programme.title: Unfetch
programme.desc: When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Sharkdoghouse
programme.desc: Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog Digs In
programme.desc: Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: Pups Save Old Trusty / Pups Save a Pony
programme.desc: Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town. // Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Train Station / The Crew Builds A Sierra Sparkle Sign
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build the first train station in Builder Cove just in time to welcome Farmer Zoe's new cow Mooreen. // Popstar Sierra Sparkle is moving to Builder Cove! But when the pups plan a surprise greeting, Speed Meister makes a plan of his own.

programme.title: Paper Aeroplanes
programme.desc: Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Emily Elephant
programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: George's Friend
programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: The Boat Pond
programme.desc: Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca's paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: The Robot Player
programme.desc: Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Smile Day
programme.desc: When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Poi
programme.desc: Chef's friend inspires him to bring Hawai'i home by making poi and decorating the Stump-staycation style.

programme.title: Avocado Sushi
programme.desc: Chef is so focused on his avocado's perfect ripeness that he ignores the rest of his avocado sushi recipe.

programme.title: Mac and Cheese
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: Race to Sky High Mountain
programme.desc: At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: A Fishy Story / Hamster Pageant
programme.desc: Popcorn loses his crown in Keesha's aquarium and the hamsters dive in to retrieve it. // When the hamsters go to a local hamster pageant, Clover has to unexpectedly compete.

programme.desc: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse
programme.desc: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: The Crew Builds a Hair Salon / The Crew Builds a Colorful Crystal Show
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build a hair salon just in time for Grandpa Gravel's special photo-until they run into a squirrely shampoo setback! / Motor and Lily make a shiny discovery worth celebrating... with the coolest light show the pups have ever seen!

programme.desc: The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo. // Boots' rubber band ball bounces into the Forest Next Door, and he must ask Cynthia the Centipede to get it back.

programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: The Fast and The Fishy
programme.desc: Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: The Time Capsule
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Recycling
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is complicated.

programme.title: George's Birthday
programme.desc: Today is George's birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.desc: Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide. / Boots gets a case of Tickle Tail that Ranita the Frog can cure if she gets her magic stripes by helping friends around the Rainforest.

programme.title: The Flying Lion
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to find the sunstone and restore Roarian's powers!

programme.title: Donuts / Rainbow Salad
programme.desc: Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up. // Chef and Olly have their hands full babysitting twelve ladybug babies and trying to make them a snack at the same time.

programme.title: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: The Great Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks
programme.desc: Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog Home Alone
programme.desc: When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival
programme.desc: When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. // The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.desc: When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! // After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: Edmond Elephant's Birthday
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Pirate Island
programme.desc: Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Jumble Sale
programme.desc: Peppa's playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Swimming
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: No Panic !
programme.desc: Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Ron's Sunburn
programme.desc: Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: The Fastest of them All
programme.desc: When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.desc: The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.desc: Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day
programme.desc: Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: The Sharkdog Scoop
programme.desc: When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: The Party Animal
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Working Like a Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: The Eye Test
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision - but that doesn't stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: The Long Grass
programme.desc: The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter
programme.desc: Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoe. Zoe has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoe has invited all of Peppa and George's friends.

programme.title: Painting
programme.desc: Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peanut Butter & Jelly / Potato Skins
programme.desc: Chef tries to make the Stump Band the best peanut butter and jelly sandwiches during their Snack Break. // It's Potato Day, Henry's favorite holiday! Chef wants to whip up Henry's favorite potato dish - except Henry can't remember what it's called!

programme.title: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: The Competition Prize
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show
programme.desc: It's Halloween, but will a curse on the theatre stop the community putting on their special spooky play?

programme.title: Paddington And Halloween
programme.desc: It's Halloween and Paddington goes Treat or Treating with Jonathan and Judy around Windsor gardens but Mr. Curry does not want to join in...or does he?

programme.title: Paddington and the Halloween Mystery / Paddington's Campfire Stories
programme.desc: It's Halloween and there are strange goings on in Windsor Gardens - will Paddington solve the spooky mystery? // Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge and will any of them be too scary!

programme.title: Trick or Treasure / The Ghost of Hamster Hollow
programme.desc: When trick-or-treaters steal the royal treasure (candy), the hamsters must get it back. // The hamsters and squirrels think they are being haunted by a nugget-stealing ghost.

programme.title: The Crew Fixes A Haunted House / The Crew Builds A Bat House
programme.desc: When Mayor Greatway asks the pups to fix up a house for her Halloween Party, they find out it might be haunted! // When Rubble & Crew discover some batty visitors at their Fall Festival, the pups must work fast to build the bats a new, safe home.

programme.title: Pups and the Ghost Pirate
programme.desc: It's Halloween! Capt'n Turbot has decorated an old wreck as a pirate ship for a town party. When the ship mysteriously heads out to sea captained by a "ghost" Ryder and the Paw Patrol must save the ship and discover the ghost!

programme.title: Best Of - Sports Collectibles
programme.desc: Will Chum strike a deal with a signed Cy Young photo, can Rick step into the ring and take a shot on a famous Muhammad Ali artefact or does Corey slide into home with a vintage bat or let it walk on by?

programme.title: The Dunbar Armored Depot Heist
programme.desc: An armoured car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the friends he recruits, more than $18 million in cash.

programme.title: On The Road: Appalachian Showdown
programme.desc: Forged in Fire is On The Road crisscrossing America looking for the best blade smiths. Today we head to North Carolina's Appalachian Mountains to the world-renowned Clay Spencer Blacksmith shop.

programme.title: Legacy
programme.desc: As the survivalists enter the second week of the competition, new challenges and opportunities arise while they battle to maintain focus. One survivalist gets another chance at the shot of a lifetime.

programme.title: Backyard Beasts
programme.desc: Some of the most painful animals can be found in your own backyard. Rob and Adam take on an assassin bug, a Jerusalem cricket, and the brown widow spider - producing a record-setting episode of pain.

programme.title: The Snake Pit
programme.desc: 'King of the Swamp' Troy Landry and Pickle Wheat get a hot tip about a place called the Snake Pit from a local. Bill and Tes investigate a rock quarry full of pythons.

programme.title: Expensive Tastes
programme.desc: Lavish dining is the epitome of living it up. These are the mega-moneyed gourmands who spent jaw-dropping sums in pursuit of the rarest, the richest, and the most forbidden food and drink money can buy.

programme.title: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: The prized possessions of some of history's richest, most powerful people haven't been castles, jewels, or fine art. It's something more exotic, endangered even, with the ability to bite back.

programme.title: On The Road: Appalachian Showdown
programme.desc: Forged in Fire is On The Road crisscrossing America looking for the best blade smiths. Today we head to North Carolina's Appalachian Mountains to the world-renowned Clay Spencer Blacksmith shop.

programme.title: The Dunbar Armored Depot Heist
programme.desc: An armoured car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the friends he recruits, more than $18 million in cash.

programme.title: The Shining Ones
programme.desc: In Ireland, the notion of the fairy folk dates back thousands of years and originates with stories of powerful shining beings who came down from the sky.

programme.title: Unlocking The Secrets Of Stonehenge
programme.desc: It's one of the most famous prehistoric monuments on Earth. A mysterious arrangement of stones that have adorned the English countryside for millennia. But nobody knows how the landmark was built or why.

programme.title: The Gladiatrix
programme.desc: When the Emperor Trajan throws his great games, the crowd is treated to a spectacle: female gladiators. The combatants are prisoners of war, but in one game a Roman woman named Mevia makes history.

programme.title: Nothing To Fear
programme.desc: Franklin Roosevelt overcomes crushing personal setbacks and leads the nation through the Great Depression with optimism, energy, and a firm belief that the only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Animated Blockbuster
programme.desc: Facing soaring costs, mounting criticism, and a tight deadline, Walt Disney pushes the limits of technology to create the first full-length animated feature film.

programme.title: Fiddles And Picks

programme.title: Scoop 2024

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: Good Morning Hong Kong brings you the latest news that matter to you.

programme.title: Sinister Beings
programme.desc: Hui Chun-sum (Ruco Chan) is an elite OCTB officer. He is fearless and competent. His boss thinks highly of him, and his colleagues really admire him. But his ultimate dream is to join SDU. Another elite OCTB officer Shum Wai-lik (Ben Wong) has a shrewd mind and extensive experience. Although the duo have different approaches, but they are like-minded and ideally complement each other. Police suffer heavy casualties as they are ambushed by thugs.

programme.title: Legend of the Condor Heroes (I), The
programme.desc: This costume Kung -fu-packed serialized drama is an authentic adaptation of the most selling Kung-fu novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long-series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these evolves around individual story lines and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they form a coherent whole._x000D_The story is set in the Sung Dynasty, when the KAM and YEUN monarchy are both invading South._x000D_YEUNG and KWOK are two sworn brothers.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Black Heart White Soul
programme.desc: A robbery case subtly interweaves the fate of three strangers, a barrister in a wheelchair KO CHIT-HANG (Kwok Chun On), a Hong Kong girl TAM MEI-CHING (Kristal Tin) and District Crime Unit detective CHEUNG LAP-FAN (Ron Ng). Implicated by her gangster boyfriend, MEI-CHING is charged with attempted robbery and is found guilty. Although CHIT-HANG, as the lawyer representing MEI-CHING, fails to exculpate her from the charge, the two fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Black Heart White Soul

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Raising The Bar
programme.desc: A group of barristers, pupil barristers, and trainee solicitors are determined to implement the rule of law in pursuit of their dreams, during which, however, they face great difficulties and challenges. The legendary couple in the legal profession, barrister FAN CHI-NGAI (Ben Wong) and his wife CHEUNG WAI-WAN (Elaine Yiu), have many pupils. Among them, TONG CHING-CHI (Grace Chan), FOK TSZ-YING (Jeannie Chan), and CHOW TSZ-BOK (Louis Cheung) are CHI-NGAI's favorite ones.

programme.desc: A group of barristers, pupil barristers, and trainee solicitors are determined to implement the rule of law in pursuit of their dreams, during which, however, they face great difficulties and challenges. The legendary couple in the legal profession, barrister FAN CHI-NGAI (Ben Wong) and his wife CHEUNG WAI-WAN (Elaine Yiu), have many pupils. Among them, TONG CHING-CHI (Grace Chan), FOK TSZ-YING (Jeannie Chan), and CHOW TSZ-BOK (Louis Cheung) are CHI-NGAI's favorite ones.

programme.title: Sinister Beings
programme.desc: Hui Chun-sum (Ruco Chan) is an elite OCTB officer. He is fearless and competent. His boss thinks highly of him, and his colleagues really admire him. But his ultimate dream is to join SDU. Another elite OCTB officer Shum Wai-lik (Ben Wong) has a shrewd mind and extensive experience. Although the duo have different approaches, but they are like-minded and ideally complement each other. Police suffer heavy casualties as they are ambushed by thugs.

programme.title: Legend of the Condor Heroes (I), The
programme.desc: This costume Kung -fu-packed serialized drama is an authentic adaptation of the most selling Kung-fu novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they form a coherent whole._x000D_The story is set in the Sung Dynasty, when the KAM and YEUN monarchy are both invading South._x000D_YEUNG and KWOK are two sworn brothers.

programme.title: Black Heart White Soul
programme.desc: A robbery case subtly interweaves the fate of three strangers, a barrister in a wheelchair KO CHIT-HANG (Kwok Chun On), a Hong Kong girl TAM MEI-CHING (Kristal Tin) and District Crime Unit detective CHEUNG LAP-FAN (Ron Ng). Implicated by her gangster boyfriend, MEI-CHING is charged with attempted robbery and is found guilty. Although CHIT-HANG, as the lawyer representing MEI-CHING, fails to exculpate her from the charge, the two fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Anti-Crime Squad
programme.desc: HEY (Ng Ngai Cheung) is a member of the Anti-crime Squad. Being a stubborn man with determination to fight crime, he never gives way to criminals. programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17)
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: When Easterly Showers Fall on the Sunny West
programme.desc: Coming from a very humble background, POON MUK HING (Ma Tak Chung) nevertheless is content with his lot. He works for the POONs of Dongshan as driver. His true identity of the eldest son of the family comes to light when he saves POON CHEUK WAH (Wong Ho Yin), the young master, in an accident. CHONG FUNG YEE (Wang Ming Chun, Liza), the first daughter-in-law in the family, has to admit unwillingly the fact that when she married into the family she was already pregnant.

programme.title: When Easterly Showers Fall on the Sunny West

programme.title: Step Into The Past, A
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is a secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and kung fu, he is recognized and given important tasks.

programme.desc: Zena (Adinda Azani) who was selling rujak, finally joined Ardo (Fauzan Nasrul) to help her sister who was about to give birth. Since then, Ardo and Zena have grown closer.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have never lost in eight Premier League meetings with Crystal Palace (W3 D5). It's both the most they've faced a side without losing and the most the Eagles have faced a side without winning in the competition.

programme.title: PL Moments 2024/25

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25
programme.desc: Before stepping into the dugout, Martin O'Neill was part of one of football's most iconic teams with Brian Clough's Nottingham Forest. Hear from Martin as he shares stories from his remarkable journey across nearly five decades in the game. From European heartbreak, to promotional triumph, discover what shaped his extraordinary career, both on the field and from the sidelines.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25
programme.desc: Born and raised a Luton Town fan, James Justin rejected the chance to join Arsenal as a youngster to play for his childhood team. The Big Interview sits down with the Leicester defender to talk about his love for his hometown club, how the loss of his father inspires him to greater things, the role Enzo Maresca played in his development and how he's looking ahead to Leicester's big game against rivals Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25
programme.desc: Born and raised a Luton Town fan, James Justin rejected the chance to join Arsenal as a youngster to play for his childhood team. The Big Interview sits down with the Leicester defender to talk about his love for his hometown club, how the loss of his father inspires him to greater things, the role Enzo Maresca played in his development and how he's looking ahead to Leicester's big game against rivals Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: PL Moments 2024/25
programme.desc: Former Bolton, Newcastle and West Ham captain Kevin Nolan joins Will Perry to reveal his top ten moments in the Premier League.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: After winning none of their first six Premier League games this season (D3 L3), Leicester have since won both of their last two. The Foxes last won three successive matches in the competition in January 2021 under Brendan Rodgers.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Brentford have lost just one of their last nine league games against Ipswich (W4 D4), with the first meeting between the sides since a 2-0 home win for the Bees in April 2019.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Wolves have picked up just one point in their last 11 Premier League games, losing more games (10) and conceding more goals (33) than any other side in that time.

programme.desc: On today's poptastic adventure, Helping Hand has created a spectacular new game. But with Plomand Mae-Mae tied on points, who will be the winner?

programme.title: Tiny Sandwiches
programme.desc: Messy joins Zim and his friends on a mission inside a sandwich to photograph some atoms for Mayor Oki... Everyone say cheese!

programme.title: Caring Sharing Monty
programme.desc: Monty is upset when a friend doesn't return his toy, and decides that he won't lend anything again. He soon realises that this isn't always helpful.

programme.title: Mount Mumandad
programme.desc: Bingo and Bluey have five minutes to bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mount Mumandad. But for them, facing powerful storms, avalanches and stinky spots will take teamwork.

programme.title: The Lost Property Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: The Pet Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: The Choreography Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: The Brandenburg Gate, Germany
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch takes the quadriga from the Brandenburg Gate, the Go Jetters must stop him before he reaches Grim HQ.

programme.title: The Statue of Liberty, USA
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch makes the Statue of Liberty fall right into the path of a passing ferry.

programme.title: Andy and The Ethiopian Wolves
programme.desc: When the photos Mr Hammond took of a family of Ethiopian wolves are mysteriously blank, it's up to Andy to save the day.

programme.title: City Parks
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how city parks play such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Proper Pirate Proficiency Test
programme.desc: Captain Captain is wearing her Proper Pirate Proficiency badge and Seaweed realises he doesn't have one! He discovers he will have to pass the Proper Pirate Proficiency Test or he'll have to leave.

programme.title: The Getting On Badge
programme.desc: When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests some team building.

programme.title: The Dressing Up Badge
programme.desc: Norrie suggest a dressing up party to celebrate Enid's birthday.

programme.title: The Traffic Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.title: Floating Farms, Bangladesh
programme.desc: Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout
programme.desc: A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Too Loud, Thomas!
programme.desc: After Thomas loses his voice, he must find a new way to pass on a very important message.

programme.title: Tummy Talk
programme.desc: When Sarah forgets her sandwich, her rumbling tummy inadvertently starts a conversation with a Frog.

programme.title: Toggle Tangle
programme.desc: After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Lunar Eclipzzz
programme.desc: Nelly has to help Nora stay awake long enough to see the Lunar eclipse.

programme.title: Dog Loves Pyramids
programme.desc: Dog and Pug find Granny Pug by a pyramid. Unfortunately, they disturb two ancient Egyptian gods in the form of a cat and a dog.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Monty tries to pack too many items for a camping trip, but he learns that sometimes less is more after he and Jimmy Jones work together.

programme.title: It's Time to Look for Signs
programme.desc: On the way home from Jared's shop with Gran Gran, JoJo finds out about the signs around them and what they mean. They are everywhere, and they all have a job to do.

programme.title: Drip Drip Drip
programme.desc: It's a rainy day and Logi-Po just wants to sit quietly and look at a book - but first he's got to stop that drip, drip, drip!

programme.title: A Whiff of Home
programme.desc: Team Tinpo help a lost dog get home, by a nose!

programme.title: Ice Cream
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each other's ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they don't notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.title: The Water Badge
programme.desc: The squirrels learn all about where water comes from.

programme.title: The Brave Banana Badge
programme.desc: When thunder and lightning scares the squirrels, Duggee teaches them about bravery.

programme.title: The Sleeping Badge
programme.desc: Tag is having trouble sleeping, so Duggee offers him a few tricks to help him.

programme.title: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia
programme.desc: A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Orange

programme.title: Cucumber
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Cucumber performing Cool Under Pressure while trying to not let any obstacle ruin her calm routine.

programme.title: Coconut Safari Club
programme.desc: Monty is surprised when his family tell him that Jimmy Jones can't appreciate music because he's an animal.

programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran and the Nature Club hear a special folk tale about a spider named Anansi.

programme.desc: JoJo is painting a picture but runs out of green paint. It's time for a Gran Gran plan!

programme.desc: When Sarah hears some interesting music on the radio, she and Duck try to recreate it.

programme.title: Cleo the Road Engine

programme.desc: Nia uses what she learns about lighthouses to suggest covering a big wheel in Christmas lights, so that Harold can see where he's going in a storm.

programme.title: Movie - Mahan Kanakku
programme.desc: Jeeva's brother-in-law is harassed by bank officials despite having paid off all loans. When he finally commits suicide, Jeeva takes advantage of the loopholes in banking to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.desc: Murali, a college student, tries every way possible to impress his classmate Rani. She eventually accepts his love, but her brother opposes their union in marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Paatti Sollai Thattathe
programme.desc: A man leaves his home after marrying a woman his family disliked. However, when he gets an opportunity to restore their relationship, he ruins it by trying to pass someone else's baby as his own.

programme.title: Movie - Vidukathai
programme.desc: Anandhi is raised by her father who is a fearless man. Neelakandan, a 40-year-old bachelor who is a tenant, becomes the only comforting factor when her father dies.

programme.title: Movie - Ettu Patti Rasa
programme.desc: Singarasu is the guardian to a group of villages and goes about resolving disputes. However, he faces problems when he gets preoccupied with work and forgets about his wife.

programme.title: Movie - Vetri Kodi Kattu
programme.desc: Two men are duped by a conman who promises to give them visas to fly to Dubai. Realising that their families might get hurt, they decide to exchange their addresses and help each other's family.

programme.title: Movie - Pennin Manathai Thottu

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBC middleweight title bout between Sergio 'Maravilla' Martinez (45-2, 24 KOs) and Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on November 20, 2010.

programme.title: Las Vegas Finals: Part 1
programme.desc: 100 finalists from across the country congregate on the Las Vegas strip for the American Ninja Warrior finals. This course consists of four stages to test the contestants' strength, speed and agility. In front of the finish line stands the massive metal monster, Mount Midoriyama with its daunting 77-foot Rope Climb. Can any of the contestants complete the challenges presented by The World's Most Difficult Obstacle Course? Part 1 of 5

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Victor Ortiz vs. Marcos Rene Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of knockout artists as Victor Ortiz, entering with eight straight knockout wins, faces Marcos Maidana, who has knockouts in 24 of his 25 victories. The winner of this bout will be crowned the interim WBA light welterweight champion.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Endo, Takakeisho, Ikioi and Kotoshogiku from the Hatsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.title: Randy Couture, Ronda Rousey, Arianny Celeste and more!
programme.desc: This episode features two-time UFC champion and Hall of Famer Randy "The Natural" Couture and his buddies firing up their motorcycles for a good cause, plus an interview with one of MMA's biggest stars, "Rowdy" Ronda Rousey. We've got another installment of the gun store challenge this time with Thiago Alves, plus we go behind the scenes for a photo shoot with ring girl Arianny Celeste, exclusively on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: FS MMA Mamed Khalidov vs. Mariusz Pudzianowski
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 77 in Gliwice, Poland, when two heavyweight stars take center stage as strongman Mariusz Pudzianowski goes toe-to-toe with former two-division titleholder Mamed Khalidov. Pudzianowski is a KSW legend and one of the world's strongest men, and he brings his size, strength and experience up against Khalidov, who has held championship gold in both the middleweight and light heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Mary Romero
programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender Mary Romero of Spain. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September. She now steps into the ring against the former European Super Bantamweight Champion, Mary Romero.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Victor Ortiz vs. Vivian Harris
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a middleweight brawl between top contenders Victor Ortiz and Vivian Harris, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: In Marseille, France
programme.desc: Episode 5: Marseille, France - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Savate and the Martial Art of Hands and Feet with Masters Christian Robert, Frank May, Frederic Baret, Laurent Bois and Patrick Gellat.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Arturo Gatti vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Arturo Gatti facing off with Alfonso Gomez in what would be Gatti's final boxing match. Also on the card, Andre Berto takes on veteran Carlos Quintana on his way to stardom.

programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender Mary Romero of Spain. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September. She now steps into the ring against the former European Super Bantamweight Champion, Mary Romero.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Mary Romero

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Victor Ortiz vs. Vivian Harris
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a middleweight brawl between top contenders Victor Ortiz and Vivian Harris, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: In Marseille, France
programme.desc: Episode 5: Marseille, France - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Savate and the Martial Art of Hands and Feet with Masters Christian Robert, Frank May, Frederic Baret, Laurent Bois and Patrick Gellat.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Arturo Gatti vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Arturo Gatti facing off with Alfonso Gomez in what would be Gatti's final boxing match. Also on the card, Andre Berto takes on veteran Carlos Quintana on his way to stardom.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Tochinoshin, Kakuryu, Ichinojo and Endo from the Hatsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.title: Dusseldorf Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. programme.title: FS MMA Nick Thompson vs. Dustin Denes
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! It's a quick knockout inthe main event as Nick Thompson slugs it out against Dustin Denes in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jermain Taylor vs. Jeff Lacy
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features former Middleweight Champion Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-2, 17 KOs) in a back and forth battle with Jeff "Left Hook' Lacy (24-1, 17 KOs) in a WBC Super Middleweight Title Eliminator on November 15, 2008 from the Vanderbilt University Memorial Gymnasium in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Oscar De La Hoya vs. Mike Grable
programme.desc: This edition highlights a bout early in the career of "The Golden Boy", fresh off his gold medal winning performance in the Olympic Games, as Oscar De La Hoya competes in just his 6th professional fight taking on 13-1-2 Mike Grable. De La Hoya had knocked out his first five opponents to start his illustrious career, and had his sights set on a World Championship less than two years after his debut. First, he would have to get passed Grable of Clarkston, Michigan, hoping for a historic upset.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Andre Berto vs. Freddy Hernandez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Andre Berto defend the WBC welterweight championship against Freddy Hernandez. With one quick, hard right hand to the face in the first round, this bout comes to a sudden halt. Berto looks to keep his undefeated streak alive and thrust himself into talks for bigger fights with the likes of stars such as Floyd Mayweather. Also on the card, Jean Pascal looks for an upset in the light heavyweight division.

programme.title: Osaka, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Goeido, Shodai, Takayasu and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.title: Vitor Belfort, Dominick Cruz, Chuck Liddell and more!
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz helps out with children's charities and feeding the hungry. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.title: FS MMA Mariusz Pudzianowski vs. Tyberiusz Kowalczyk
programme.desc: From Warsaw, Poland, FIGHT SPORTS MMA features action from KSW 39, including the return of World's Strongest Man winner Mariusz Pudzianowski taking on fellow strongman Tyberiusz Kowalczyk in the main event. This stadium event, dubbed 'Colosseum', would shatter the all-time attendance record for an MMA event with an audience of over 58,000.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: Assignment Asia
programme.desc: Assignment Asia is a current affairs program that takes an in-depth look at stories from all over Asia. The show focuses on people. It puts the spotlight on issues affecting the region through interviews with and first-person accounts of ordinary people with extraordinary stories.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving CGTN a competitive edge in the North American media market.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Born and raised a Luton Town fan, James Justin rejected the chance to join Arsenal as a youngster to play for his childhood team. The Big Interview sits down with the Leicester defender to talk about his love for his hometown club, how the loss of his father inspires him to greater things, the role Enzo Maresca played in his development and how he's looking ahead to Leicester's big game against rivals Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Before stepping into the dugout, Martin O'Neill was part of one of football's most iconic teams with Brian Clough's Nottingham Forest. Hear from Martin as he shares stories from his remarkable journey across nearly five decades in the game. From European heartbreak, to promotional triumph, discover what shaped his extraordinary career, both on the field and from the sidelines.

programme.desc: With over 200 appearances for Everton, Tim Cahill established himself as the high-energy midfielder who helped drive the side. programme.desc: The CONMEBOL Sudamericana, named as Copa Sudamericana , is an annual international club football competition organized by CONMEBOL since 2002. The CONMEBOL Sudamericana began in 2002, replacing the separate competitions Copa Merconorte and Copa Mercosur (that had replaced Copa CONMEBOL) by a single competition.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai and the Future of AI
programme.desc: Google & Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai sits down with Emily Chang to discuss the future of search, accelerating work on Google's AI models and how his upbringing prepared him for this moment.

programme.title: Can Anduril Reboot the US Defense Industry?
programme.desc: Can Anduril Reboot the US Defense Industry? Emily Chang meets Anduril founder Palmer Luckey for a closer look at his defence tech startup's autonomous fleet and software operations.

programme.title: The Boy-King of Toy Videos Is Growing Up
programme.desc: Ryan Kaji is the reigning king of toy videos and one of YouTube's biggest and highest-paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents on the set of his new movie for a look at the young influencer's next act.

programme.title: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Emily Chang sits down with Mark Zuckerberg to discuss how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: Bloomberg Originals
programme.desc: Exploring every angle of climate change, technology, finance, sports and beyond, Bloomberg Originals is business as you've never seen it.

programme.title: Business
programme.desc: A behind the scenes, inside scoop look at business today. Meet the entrepreneurs, small businesses and large corporations impacting the economy and our daily lives.

programme.title: World
programme.desc: Powerful stories, revealing conversations and animations to help make sense of the world.

programme.title: Business
programme.desc: A behind the scenes, inside scoop look at business today. Meet the entrepreneurs, small businesses and large corporations impacting the economy and our daily lives.

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: Adena Friedman
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with Nasdaq CEO Adena Friedman about her competitive deal-making mindset, how she's transformed Nasdaq and the current sports business landscape.

programme.title: Billie Jean King & Ilana Kloss
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit with tennis champions Billie Jean King and Ilana Kloss to discuss the current buzz around women's sports and hear how they helped grow professional women's hockey.

programme.title: How Korean Pop Culture Is Transforming Design
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslina Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Beyond Earth: Private Ambitions in Space
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: The Green Bible
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: The Stradivarius Murders
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Run For Your Life
programme.desc: In 2021, Agnes Tirop broke the women's 10,000 meter world record. Five weeks later, she was dead. We examine her murder and the threat of violence for other Kenyan runners.

programme.title: The Poison In Us All
programme.desc: PFAS chemicals are used in thousands of products aimed at making life easier. But the chemicals are now almost everywhere, including in human blood, and are being linked to severe health problems.

programme.title: Americans Cash in on a Paddle-Sport Obsession
programme.desc: Americans Cash in on a Paddle-Sport Obsession. Pickleball is the hottest sport in America. In the premiere of "Next in Sports," we test the case for the paddle craze.

programme.title: How Formula One Finally Hooked America
programme.desc: How Formula One Finally Hooked America. Not so long ago it was the circuits of Monaco and Monza that epitomized Formula 1. Its modern ambitions, however, are more Miami.

programme.title: How to Build a Brand New Sport
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand New Sport. Despite Teqball being relatively unknown, the sport's creators have big plans for it. Can you build any game into a mainstream sport if you have the will and the money?

programme.title: Cornhole Goes From NFL Tailgate Pastime to Main Event
programme.desc: Next in Sports explores new sports, as well as innovations in existing pastimes, illustrating what's happening around the corner and across the globe.

programme.title: The Pro-League With Players as Bosses
programme.desc: The Pro-League With Players as Bosses. Athletes Unlimited is capitalising on the growing audience for women's softball, volleyball and basketball by investing in the athletes themselves.

programme.title: Can the Ancient Indian Sport of Kabaddi Someday Rival Cricket?
programme.desc: Can the Ancient Indian Sport of Kabaddi Someday Rival Cricket? Billionaire businessman Anand Mahindra wants to make the Indian game of Kabaddi number one, in a nation where cricket is king.

programme.title: The Green Bible
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: The Dark Side of TikTok
programme.desc: TikTok's secret algorithm has been blamed for sending young users content that pushes some into a spiral of self-harm. We take a look at the darker side of the world's most downloaded app.

programme.title: Poisoning the Amazon
programme.desc: Poisoning the Amazon. Aluminium in Ford's new electric F-150 can be traced back to bauxite mines in the Amazon whose owners have long faced allegations of pollution and land appropriation.

programme.title: The Money Doctor
programme.desc: In Texas, a former preacher exploited the trust of his peers under a cloak of religious virtue. This is the intimate story of those whose lives were destroyed by his $38 million dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: Money, Ego and Deception at FTX
programme.desc: A feature documentary about Sam Bankman-Fried and the stunning collapse of FTX, his cryptocurrency exchange.

programme.title: Billie Jean King & Ilana Kloss
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit with tennis champions Billie Jean King and Ilana Kloss to discuss the current buzz around women's sports and hear how they helped grow professional women's hockey.

programme.title: David Rubenstein
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with David Rubenstein, co-founder of The Carlyle Group, about his recent purchase of the Baltimore Orioles and what the team means for the city.

programme.title: Adena Friedman
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with Nasdaq CEO Adena Friedman about her competitive deal-making mindset, how she's transformed Nasdaq and the current sports business landscape.

programme.title: Stephen A. Smith
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with sportscaster Stephen A. Smith about becoming the face of ESPN, how he defines his worth and the lessons he's learned along the way.

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: Beyond Earth: Private Ambitions in Space
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: How Korean Pop Culture Is Transforming Design
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslina Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Colorado's Maverick Inventors
programme.desc: Best-selling author Ashlee Vance travels the world to engage with the most brilliant, audacious and controversial pioneers in science and technology.

programme.title: Switzerland Part 1: A High-Tech Utopia
programme.desc: Switzerland is full of advanced tech startups. We visit an inventor who makes drones do miraculous things and a company that's growing human skin in a lab.

programme.title: Switzerland Part 2: Brains, Brains, Brains
programme.desc: From a company that helps restore movement in the paralysed to brain-research labs combining neuroscience and AI, Switzerland is home to some of the most advanced research on the brain.

programme.title: The World's Craziest Car Race
programme.desc: Burning Man meets Mad Max at King of the Hammers, a 212-mile-long offroad race in the California desert that only the hardiest racers with the most kitted-out vehicles will even finish.

programme.title: Animal Communication
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: Quantum Computing
programme.desc: Mathematician and Author Hannah Fry explores the powerful new technologies set to shape society, and whether that future is one that we want. Our future doesn't just happen, we make it.

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: Next Billion
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: Dusk Or Dawn
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: Shelter
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: Regenerate
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: Cleaning Up Crypto

programme.title: The Future of Water
programme.desc: The Future of Water. Kal Penn explores how the western US can cope with a decades-old megadrought and whether recycled wastewater is a solution to the world's limited water supplies.

programme.title: How We Stay Cool
programme.desc: How We Stay Cool. In this episode of Getting Warmer, Kal Penn explores whether there's a sustainable way to cool a warming world, and the "cold chains" that keep food unspoiled.

programme.title: Generation EV
programme.desc: Generation EV. Kal travels to Nevada to visit the company building America's first closed-loop supply chain for electric vehicles, while examining the industry's reliance on the carbon-intensive kind.

programme.title: Tackling Methane
programme.desc: Tackling Methane. Kal explores the threat methane poses as it's released by everything from air conditioners to agriculture, and how strategies like regenerative agriculture can help tackle it.

Always cherishing her individuality, she sometimes struggles, but powerfully and joyfully pushes through the turbulent Heisei and Reiwa eras.

programme.title: Historical Drama "Dear Radiance" Eps. 40 (R)
programme.desc: While the story written by Mahiro continues to be the talk of the imperial palace, Emperor Ichijo falls ill and a mood of disquiet begins to emerge. The emperor bravely pretends to be fine in front of Empress Akiko, but when Michinaga receives a report of an ominous omen from fortune-teller, the nobles’ movement for the next imperial throne accelerate.

programme.title: NHK Cup Canoe Slalom Competition

It also challenges the mysteries of history by using the traces left on the treasures as clues!

programme.title: Saturday Drama "30 million" Eps. 4
programme.desc: Sasaki Yuko (Adachi Yumi) works as a temporary employee at a call center, struggling with her mortgage and child-rearing. Despite her overbearing boss and uncertain future, she tries to make ends meet. Her husband Yoshimitsu (Aoki Munetaka) is optimistic but doesn’t earn much, which frustrates Yuko and her only joy is her son. One day, a misfortune strikes the Sasaki family, and a momentary lapse in judgment drastically changes their lives.
